headline: Visa Expands Global Digital Payments Reach With Argentina Deals And PayPay IPO
summary: Visa (NYSE:V) has completed its acquisitions of Prisma Medios de Pago and Newpay in Argentina. The company has also participated as a cornerstone investor in SoftBank backed PayPay's planned U.S. IPO. These moves expand Visa's presence in Latin American payments and deepen its role in global digital payment platforms. Visa operates a global payments network that connects consumers, merchants, financial institutions and governments. By taking full control of Prisma and Newpay in Argentina,...
